reviewText: I enjoyed Little Lord Fauntleroy; it was just like the book. But The Little Princess wasn't anything like the book; I didn't enjoy it too much. I like the book much better.
Brought back memories of my childhood.  Loved it....
Love the movies and the Lord Fauntleroy was outstanding to watch! :)  ENJOY the classics!!  Mickey Roonie was neat as a chikd actor.
Good DVD with lots of extra episodes -- old but cute, my 8-year old girl loves it.
